cells.data:
## Purpose

Testing the LB broth after re-growing D. birchii and D. bocki colonies. I grew up six colonies each. This PCR was testing those 12 colonies confirmation of construct and insert.

The primers flank the construct and through the end of the insert.

I then See [Building the Construct](quiver-note-url/5BF88CDB-05C4-454F-9E42-C33415A7B6D1) for more details.

## Samples

Primers: `ES2_confirm_cm` and `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`

1-6 - D. birchii LB 
7-9 - D. bocki LB 

## Program

| step | temp       |  time  |
|------|------------|--------|
| 1    | 95         | 30 sec |
| 2    | 95         | 15 sec |
| 3    | 64         | 1 min  |
| 4    | 72         | 2 min  |
| 5    | 72         | 1 min  |
| 6    | 4          | hold   |

## Results

I ran the gel too long and ran off the bocki samples. 

![Screen Shot 2016-09-21 at 11.48.10 AM.png](quiver-image-url/9589C029EC3029841FFA59AC12FB1EED.png)

![Screen Shot 2016-09-21 at 11.53.42 AM.png](quiver-image-url/60BA72AAC2E6625AA1136CC1A9F6DE41.png)

There is presence in all.
